author: Ryan Kent
description: Reminiscent of a coconut and falernum (clove influenced) daquiri.
name: Playa Fortuna

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
<strong>*Special ingredient #1<strong>: Coconut cordial – made with equal parts by weight coconut water and white sugar
<strong>*Special ingredient #2<strong>: Tartaric acid – made with 1 part cream of tartar and 5 parts water by weight
